mutants.code:
def reverse_bits(n: int) -> int:
    binary_str = bin(n)[2:]
    reversed_binary_str = binary_str[::-1]
    padded_reversed_binary_str = reversed_binary_str.ljust(33, '0')
    reversed_integer = int(padded_reversed_binary_str, 2)
    return reversed_integer
